header.jobTitle: Project Manager/System Analyst – Quality Assurance for banking project

companyOverview.html: Excel Technology International (Hong Kong) Limited is a leading consulting & software solutions provider to the banking and finance sectors. Established in 1988, and headquartered in Hong Kong, Excel currently has over 500 IT professionals across Hong Kong, Taipei, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Shanghai, Hangzhou, Beijing, and SE Asia.  Over the past 30 years, we have developed a specialization in providing enterprise software development and e-Commerce solutions to financial institutions. Due to our business expansion, we are inviting high caliber candidates to join our teams handling increasingly challenging projects.

summary: conduct QA/Testing;Lead offshore QA Testing team
Exp in using Jira, auto-testing tools is a plus

jobDescription.html:
Excel is a Hong Kong based IT Consulting company with over 30 years of history.   We specialize in Banking & Finance systems.  In order to cope with the development in Digital Banking, we are looking for the following candidates to join our consulting teams:

 Duties: 

  • Stationed at the client’s Hong Kong office;
  • Lead an offshore QA Testing Team in Mainland China;
  • Lead and design testing scopes & testing plans
  • Write testing scripts from time-to-time when necessary. 

Requirements:   

  • Bachelor’s degree holder in Computer Science, IT or equivalent
  • 5 years or above working experience in banking IT projects;
  • Solid experience in conducting QA/Testing;
  • Able to adequately communicate in Mandarin;
  • Good inter-personal skills to work with end-users to ensure their co-operation and project progress;
  • Experience in using Jira is an advantage;
  • Knowledge of Auto-testing tools is a plus.

 For application, please send your detailed resume (in word format), current and expected salary with cover letter (please quote our reference number) to Human Resources Manager, Excel Technology International (HK) Limited, 5th Floor, 663 King’s Road, North Point, Hong Kong or click Apply Now.

Data collected from applicants will be kept confidential and only be used for recruitment purpose.

company.name: China Merchants Securities International Company Limited

companyOverview.html: China Merchants Securities International Co., Limited (“we”), wholly owned by China Merchant Securities Company Limited (Stock Code: 6099.HK/600999.SH), is principally engaged in the provision of a wide range of financial services including brokerage, corporate financing, sales and trading, leveraged and structured lending, asset management, private equity, global commodities and futures. summary: Identify, document and prioritize defects and bugs

jobDescription.html:
Job Responsibilities:

  • Based on the Business requirement documents, the functional requirement documents and the unit test cases from development team to prepare the list QA test cases (such as functional, performance, stress, regression & etc.), expected results and test data;
  • Based on Test Plan and Test Case, execute the functional test, performance test, stress test and regression test accordingly;
  • Ensure QA process is on the right track all the way as part of the SDLC project lifecycle and firm wide QA policy;
  • Manage the test environment and resources;
  • Identify and document the application defects and bugs;
  • Prepare test reports; 
  • Maintain good relationship between the business and the IT project team, managing appropriate business expectations and negotiating compromise where appropriate; 
  • Work with vendor or in-house development teams to ensure that the engineers get appropriate support;
  • Manage all test related documents;
  • Perform such other duties as shall from time to time be directed by the line manager/ direct supervisor.  

Job Requirements:

  • Bachelor Degree holder of Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance, relevant disciplines;
  • Good domain knowledge, such as equity and trade lifecycle is an advantage;
  • Good command of spoken and written English. Conversational level of Putonghua is an advantage;
    Solid knowledge on Selenium, Appium, Jmeter, Performance Center, Application lifecycle Management (ALM), Eclipse and other automation testing and loading test tools;
  • Good understanding of IT systems and functions in general. Exposure to technologies, such as C++, C#, Java, RESTful API, SQL database, Excel VBA and scripting language;
  • A minimum of 3 years of quality assurance work experience;
  • Solid experience on test managament, test process, test plan design, test result analysis, system migration and system deployment;
  • Understanding of Securities Trade Processing lifecycle is an advantage;
  • Experience in liaising with all relevant parties in IT and working with business stakeholders;
  • Excellent analytical, interpersonal and communication skills.

We offer attractive remuneration and benefits including 5-day working week to the right candidates. Interested parties, please send your full resume including your CURRENT and EXPECTED salary to us by email. 

Personal data provided will be used by us for recruitment and related purposes, which is strictly in accordance with the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Cap. 486 of the Laws of Hong Kong) for Applicants for Employment. Applicants who are not contacted within 6 weeks may consider your applications unsuccessful and the personal data collected will be destroyed after 2 years or such other period as prescribed by the applicable laws.

summary: Automation training provided, welcome fresh grad

jobDescription.html:
THE JOB

  • Manage the QA testing process to ensure quality deliveries of Web Platforms and iOS/ Android mobile apps.
  • Support and coordinate closely with internal teams to understand user requirements.
  • Create and execute test plans and test cases according to specifications.
  • Provide test result record and liaise with internal teams to resolve defects.
  • Report and provide feedback to make improvement in the quality of deliverables as well as the QA process.

THE PERSON

  • Higher Diploma or above in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent
  • 1 years or above experience in software testing
  • Strong knowledge in QA process and methodology
  • Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadline
  • Good communication skills in both English and Chinese
  • Experience in automatic test framework such as Appium or Selenium is a plus (will be consider as senior QA )

To apply online please click the Apply button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact us on +852 2391 2813.

All personal data provided will be used for consideration of your job application only.

Cityline (Hong Kong) Limited is a leading IT solution provider, specializing in e-commerce transaction applications and payment solution. summary: Define, review, implement QA policies & procedures
Lead a small team to archive the testing goal
Perform other QA administrative duties as needed

jobDescription.html:
Job Description:

  • Define, review, and implement quality assurance policies and procedures;
  • Design and write test plans and test cases based on user / product requirements;
  • Execute test plans and prepare test reports;
  • Report and reproduce defects found during testing or reported by users;
  • Assist in analyzing the potential causes of defects based on observed test results;
  • Verify effectiveness of fixes and corrective actions;
  • Perform different types of testing on the target system;
  • Work on multiple complex projects simultaneously;
  • Lead a small team to archive the testing goal for larger or more complicated projects;
  • Perform other QA administrative duties as needed;
  • Prepare training materials / user guides & manuals for software products.

Requirements:

  • University degree holder in Computer Science/ Software Engineering or equivalent;
  • At least 5 years relevant software QA experience;
  • Track record of software testing / development projects;
  • Self-starter with the ability to work independently and able to work under pressure;
  • Strong analytical and technical troubleshooting skills to isolate problem/defect areas;
  • Experience on translating functional specification to test case;
  • Experience on report and track product defects with issue tracking system;
  • Experience in SQL database and web application and native mobile applications QA testing;
  • Time Management Skills;
  • Good oral and written communication skills in both English and Cantonese;
  • Candidate with less experience will be considered as QA Engineer.

Job Location: Kwun Tong (2 minutes walk to Kwun Tong MTR station)

We offer attractive remuneration based on experience and potential, 5-day work, and the opportunity to grow with an exciting company. Please apply with full resume, contact details and expected salary.

Personal data will be collected for recruitment purposes and a copy of our Personal Information Collection Statement will be provided upon your request. We may transfer your personal data to other associated companies within the Lark International Group Limited which have other suitable vacancies.

companyOverview.html:
If you’re talented, passionate and creative,
Come and Join us!

ESD Services Limited is a joint venture between CK Hutchison (formerly Hutchison Whampoa) and Hewlett-Packard which both have been ranked on the Forbes Global 2000 List. We have been recognized as a pioneer in the industry by establishing the world’s first bilingual e-government portal “ESDlife” for Hong Kong government. Today, ESDlife has transitioned and developed into a full-fledged online lifestyle media and e-business company with our flagship brand, ESDlife Wedding, Hong Kong’s most popular wedding planning website. Together with our other brands, such as ESDlife Family and healthyD, we are now one of the largest and most diversified e-business in Hong Kong.

ESDlife is all about people. We not only aim to enrich people’s lives through digital technology, we are also empowered by our amazing team members. Here, you’ll be different because of incredible culture, you’ll be challenged because of valuable opportunities, you’ll be inspired because of brilliant creativeness and you’ll be proud because of being one of us. 

If you have the spunk and brains to make a difference, come join us now!

companyOverview.html:
Robert Walters is one of the world's leading global specialist recruitment consultancies. The Robert Walters brand stands for innovation, vision and leadership in the global recruitment market.

Robert Walters specialises in permanent and contract recruitment across all industry sectors and all levels of seniority, and count the world's leading investment banks, multinational blue-chip commercial organisations and innovative SMEs as clients. Our international network and global brand presence, along with our unrivalled professionalism and specialist knowledge, ensure that we offer only the highest quality of service to both our clients and candidates.

Established in London in 1985, the Group now operates across 28 countries. Robert Walters' Hong Kong office specialises in accounting & finance, banking & financial services, human resources & business support, information technology, legal & compliance, sales & marketing, as well as supply chain, logistics & procurement.

An award-winning business, Robert Walters has a proven track record of providing high quality recruitment services, and our success is further endorsed by the many awards we have won over the years.

For more information about Robert Walters Hong Kong, please visit www.robertwalters.com.hk.

companyOverview.html:
The Hong Kong Interbank Clearing Limited (HKICL) is a private company owned by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) and the Hong Kong Association of Banks (HKAB). The key objective of the company is to develop and operate a safe and efficient multi-currency and multi-dimensional financial infrastructure in Hong Kong. It operates an integrated financial infrastructure platform for:

  • interbank large value funds transfers denominated in HKD, USD, Euro and RMB;
  • interbank money settlement of equity and debt securities transactions in Hong Kong via linkage established with the Hong Kong Securities Clearing Company Limited and Central Moneymarkets Unit system (CMU);
  • interbank small value funds transfer denominated in HKD and RMB, i.e. the HKD and RMB faster payment systems (FPS);
  • interbank clearing and/or money settlement of retail payments in Hong Kong such as paper cheques, autodebits, autocredits, credit card payments, etc.; and
  • the HKMA’s CMU system, as a computer operator.

summary: At least 4 years’ quality assurance experience
Competence in writing test plans and scripts

jobDescription.html:
Major Responsibilities:

  • Prepare test cases / test scripts and other relevant documents for conducting UAT, certification tests and simulation tests to facilitate a smooth implementation of business projects
  • Co-ordinate, prepare, execute and follow up on test cases / scripts and document test results and problem logs
  • Assist in maintaining UAT problem logs and coordinate with IT development team to identify the resolution
  • Manage UAT of small to medium sized projects and prepare relevant documents which include UAT plan
  • Prepare and maintain comprehensive documentation for projects being implemented before, during and after testing
  • Communicate and liaise with users and IT teams in carrying out testing
  • Promote quality assurance standard and best practices to the team

Requirements:

  • University/ Tertiary education with at least 4 years’ quality assurance experience with exposure in financial sector
  • Hands-on testing experience in mobile and Web-based applications for financial systems as well as knowledge in ISO20022 message would be an advantage
  • Technical knowledge of SWIFT messages and XML would be preferred
  • Solid experience in quality assurance process, competence in writing test plans and scripts preferably with knowledge of financial systems
  • Strong logical and analytical mindset and capable of comprehending both business knowledge and technical knowledge
  • Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese
  • Good interpersonal, presentation and communication skills with sound business sense and detail-oriented
  • Independent, self-motivated, organized and able to work under pressure with tight schedules
  • Candidates with less experience may be considered for a junior position

How to Apply

Interested parties please send your curriculum vitae stating your current and expected salaries, and the contact phone number to the Human Resources Division, Unit B, 25/F, MG Tower, 133 Hoi Bun Road, Kwun Tong, Kowloon or apply online by clicking the "Apply Now" button below.

All applications and personal information collected will be treated in strict confidence and only be used for the purpose of recruitment and selection.  The information collected will be accessed by our authorized personnel only.  Unsuccessful applications will be retained for two years for possible future job matching, and will be destroyed after the expiry of two years.

companyOverview.html: APACPro is the most enthusiastic and wholeheartedly eCommerce system integration service provider in APAC. Some of the world’s best-known retailers and brands leverage our knowledge and technical service to provide a fully branded experience.

jobDescription.html:
Job Highlights

  • Develop your career in innovation technology
  • One of the best technology firm in the market
  • Excellent team and talented colleagues

Job Description

You will be responsible for being aQuality Assurance Analyst who manages our top tier projects, with our award-winning team. On a day to day basis you will be required to get involved in every part of the project process to help our team reach the milestones and quality required. 

Responsibilities:

  • Review project requirements and related documentation such as sitemaps, wireframes, information architecture specifications & functional specifications.
  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases.
  • Execute the plan and manage all activities in the plan to ensure that all the project objectives are met and the solution works as expected.
  • Track and report the QA activities on a per project basis.
  • Work closely within the project team (PM and Developers) to identify, investigate, and resolve system problems and process issues.
  • Review project deliverables and artifacts from a testing perspective, and provide feedback, including actively participating in a test plan review with the team.
  • Analyze test results to ensure existing functionality and make appropriate recommendations.
  • Contribute to and monitor test planning, test preparation and scripting, and test execution according to established test standards and procedures.
  • Manage verification and validation activities for all production modifications.
  • Maintain document template libraries and internal project documentation related to testing, including releases and changes.
  • Work closely with development team to review issues or bug reports.
  • Participate and provide opinions on projects.


Requirement:

  • 2+ years’ experience in web application development with quality assurance/test experience
  • Sound knowledge of web project development
  • Knowledgeable in all processes and procedures utilized for quality assurance
  • Experience with different operating systems, common web browsers, HTML and CSS
  • Knowledge with Atlassian products Jira and Confluence
  • Proficient in quality assurance methodology, change management and communication skills
  • Proficiency in both spoken and written English and Chinese
  • Positive “can-do” attitude

Location

Hong Kong

jobDescription.html:
We are looking for talents to join our Team:

Software QA Engineer (Automation)

The Job

  • Develop and execute test plans and test cases by analyses and understand product requirement, architecture, and interdependencies;
  • Determine and apply appropriate test methodologies and cases;
  • Contribute to the building of a Continuous Integration (CI) environment and ongoing process improvement activities;
  • Work close with product teams on understanding requirements, identify testing needs, design test plans, help execute tests, and report defects on assigned systems;
  • Improving code quality through interaction with development teams; and 
  • Participates in Agile sprints and ceremonies; supports rapid iteration and development

The Person

  • Bachelor or above in Computer Science, Information Technology or similar 
  • More than 3 years of related work experience
  • Candidates with more experience may be considered as Senior Software QA Engineer
  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies and automated test techniques
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment
  • Experience in handling IoT or hardware project is a plus
  • Knowledge of continuous integration practices, preferably using Jenkins is a plus ·
  • Self-starter, independent and well-organized
  • Good communication skills in English, technical and otherwise

Come and join us in a multi-cultural, dynamic and stable work environment, experience the opportunity to develop your career and to work in different exciting projects in an nicely decorated office.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. Interested parties, please send us your job application, the position you apply, together with current and expected salary (Expected salary is not listed in CV will not be considered). We look forward to your application.

companyOverview.html:
WeLab is a leading fintech company in Asia with one of the first virtual banks established in Hong Kong. WeLab provides financial services by creating seamless digital experiences to over 36 million customers across Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Indonesia.

Using its proprietary risk management technology and advanced AI capabilities, WeLab effectively analyzes unstructured mobile big data within seconds to provide innovative financial services and offer consumer financing solutions for individual customers. The company also offers B2B enterprise solutions by partnering with traditional financial institutions, which utilize WeLab’s technology to offer fintech-enabled services to their customers. WeLab operates WeLend and WeLab Bank in Hong Kong, WeLab Digital (我来数科), Taoxinji (淘新机) and Tianmian Lab (天冕) in Mainland China and a fintech joint venture AWDA in Indonesia.

WeLab’s investors include Malaysian sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Berhad, CK Hutchison’s TOM Group, International Finance Corporation (a member of the World Bank Group), Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund, Sequoia Capital and ING Bank.

summary: Ensure proper development of test plans
Design and execute functional test plans
Validate the deliverable to meet the planned level

jobDescription.html:
WeLab operates WeLend and WeLab Bank in Hong Kong, WeLab Digital (我来数科), Taoxinji (淘新机) and Tianmian Lab (天冕) in Mainland China and a fintech joint venture AWDA in Indonesia. WeLab aims to bring joy to everyone’s financial journey. We strive to improve people’s lives by reinventing financial services through game-changing technology. We put our people first, whether it’s our customers or our employees.

As the only homegrown Hong Kong fintech to receive a virtual banking license, we aim to reinvent and redefine the banking experience by building a bank we love.

We are an energetic and passionate team that can deliver and execute. We are looking for other intellectually curious, open-minded and smart-working individuals who are just as passionate as we are about making financial services enjoyable. Now you have the opportunity to join us on our journey to achieve our vision and be part of building a better financial future for everyone.

About you:
  • You're a go-getter with mad juggling skills (or multiple hats) who can thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment
  • You have a strong thirst for knowledge and are driven to find solutions that don't exist yet
  • You are comfortable with ambiguity and extremely resourceful (in your past life you could've been a detective)
  • You always find a way to get things done without sacrificing the quality of your work, integrity and values. No task is off limits for you.
  • You are humble and prioritize the success of the team over your own with an eagerness to help those around you
  • You don't shy away from challenges and have the ability to bounce back from setbacks
 What you’ll do and what success looks like in this role
  • Understand business requirements to ensure proper development of test plans
  • Design and execute functional test plans for existing and new features of our products
  • Understand at least one programming language e.g. python, java to develop API and UI automation script
  • Validate the deliverable to meet the planned level of performance and comply with established quality standards
  • Identify application issues, report discrepancies, prepare test report and recommend improvements
  • Communicate and liaise with users and development teams in carrying out testing  
 What is required and what we’re looking for
  • Degree holder in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines
  • Minimum 3 years’ experience in software and system testing
  • Hands on experience in manual, performance and automation test
  • Familiar with automation tool like selenium and Appium
  • Understanding of application software components and integration, development and processes, application testing methodology
  • Detail oriented, well organized and pro-active
  • Self-motivated and able to work in a dynamic environment under a tight schedule
WeLab perks:
  • Competitive salary
  • Learning and development stipend, because we value lifelong learning and believe the best way to invest in our employees is to encourage them to continue to learn
  • Work hard and laugh lots (chicken wings and french toast, etc.) with a high-performing, fun and diverse team
  • Weekly afternoon teas and fully stocked fridge
  • Coffee stipend
  • Conveniently located office surrounded by diverse and delicious lunch options
  • Lively office with gaming consoles and a ping pong table
  • Fun extracurricular activities with your colleagues like hiking, yoga, badminton, wine tasting, dragon boat racing, rock climbing, etc.
  • Employee referral bonuses
Awards & recognition:
  • Financial Times (FT) 2020 Asia-Pacific High-Growth Companies – #2 ranked company
  • 2020 CNBC Disruptor 50 List – #11, only company included from Hong Kong and just one of five from Asia
We offer competitive salary package to the successful candidate.  If you are interested in joining this exciting team, please apply with resume via the "Apply" button below.

All information provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only. Information of unsuccessful applicants will be destroyed within 24 months of receipt.

companyOverview.html:
FreshUp is one of the largest vending machine operators in Hong Kong. Our innovative and reliable vending services are trusted by a long list of clients including HKSAR Gov, investment banks, law firms, universities, government agencies etc. We own and operate ~2000 vending machines and have been growing fast.

Please visit our website at www.freshup.com.hk to learn more about us

companyOverview.html:
AEON Credit Service (Asia) Co., Ltd., a public company listed on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong, is a major player in the credit card market in Hong Kong.  We have over 25 years' experience in the financial services industry.  We are a member of AEON Group which is a Fortune Global 500 company.  To cope with our business expansion, we are inviting applications for the following position:

Interested parties please send your application with our reference number and CV with expected salary and availability to hr.recruitment@aeon.com.hk

summary: Minimum 2 years or above relevant experience
Experience with software testing, SDLC and QMS

jobDescription.html:
Responsibilities: 

  • Ensure deliverables from system developers comply with established quality standards
  • Ensure submitted requirements and design are complete and testable
  • Ensure sufficient testing at all stages (unit test, SIT, UAT) is planned and executed according to plan
  • Conduct quality check based on submitted documentation
  • Co-ordinate with development staff and users for working out testing
  • Communicate with users to clarify requirements during testing when necessary
  • Prepare test plans and conduct smoke test
  • Participate in and co-ordinate SIT and UAT activities when necessary

 Requirements:

  • Degree holder in Computer Science or related disciplines
  • Minimum 2 years or above relevant experience
  • Experience with software testing, SDLC and QMS
  • Exposure to vendor collaboration and structured testing methodology is an advantage
  • Knowledge in AS400 and RPG is preferable
  • Knowledge in Windows, Linux and Unix platform is an advantage
  • Exposure to ISO9001/27001 and J-SOX is an advantage
  • Hardworking, able to work independently and to work under a tight schedule and meet deadlines
  • Fluent in spoken and written English and Cantonese
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office
  • Immediate available is highly preferred

We offer 5-days work week, comprehensive training, on-the-job development program and rewarding career opportunities for ambitious individuals who are looking for challenges.

Interested parties please send your application with expected salary and availability to us.

(All personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only.)

We offer company stock option! If you are highly motivated and enthusiastic in gaming industry, we sincerely invite you to join our fun and growing team!

jobDescription.html:

  • Develop comprehensive test plans and detailed test cases from documented game requirements
  • Create detailed tracking reports to track bugs and errors
  • Follow test plans to complete QA for each game version release
  • Perform directed ad-hoc testing on focused areas
  • Compose daily and weekly progress reports

Requirements:

  • Experience in mobile game QA testing
  • Strong communication and analytical skills
  • Familiar with the popular mobile games released in past 5 years
  • Able to work under pressure on a tight schedule
  • Loves playing games

Benefits:

  • Paid birthday leave

  • Performance bonus
  • Medical insurance
  • Dental subsidy
  • Free snack and beverage
  • Friendly working environment

companyOverview.html:
Derivco Hong Kong is a regional developer of state-of-the-art online games working alongside development houses across the world. Through our cutting edge technology, we deliver next generation online games which are enjoyed by thousands of gaming enthusiasts globally. Our operations in Hong Kong began in 2010, and now comprise of a strong team of like-minded people working in a stimulating environment, collaborating creatively on challenging projects and technical innovation. As an employer, we strive to create a comfortable and fun working atmosphere that focuses on teamwork and knowledge sharing, which we believe are key ingredients for personal development and progression.

We are now expanding our team in Hong Kong, and we seek people who are passionate about software technology, team player, and willing to learn. This is a unique opportunity for you to be part of a team working at the forefront of software engineering.

For more information, please visit www.derivco.com.hk.

jobDescription.html:
Responsibilities

  • Analyze new features requirements and prepare test cases / test data to ensure product is tested to agreed level
  • Provide, execute and manage manual tests, automation tests and test plans for various systems projects
  • Assist to manage application issues, incident management, root cause analysis and resolution
  • Perform hands-on testing of Microservices/ API Testing, E2E testing, L&P tests
  • Collaborate in a cross-function team to ensure that all aspects of quality are actively discussed and addressed during the agile project lifecycle

 Requirements

  • University graduate in Computer Science / Software Engineering related discipline with latest IT knowledge
  • 3+ years of Relevant Experience
  • Relevant working experience and knowledge of API testing is a must
  • Relevant working experience and knowledge of SQL is preferred
  • Excellent trouble shooting and problem-solving skills
  • Familiar with API testing tools (e.g. SoapUI, JMeter, Fiddler, Postman)
  • Self-motivated and able to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment
  • Good communication skills in English and Chinese
  • Candidate with more experience will be considered as QA Analyst II
We offer an attractive remuneration package and provide a fun, friendly and flexible working environment to our staff. Personal data collected will be used for employment-related purpose only. We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

companyOverview.html:
Osmium Consulting Group was founded with one single aim in mind - to provide professional recruitment and HR advisory services to our clients and candidates.

We believe Relationship & Understanding are the key pillars in our business. Maintain good relationships with both our clients and candidates is as important as an understanding of their needs.

jobDescription.html:
We are hiring :
  • In-House
  • Manual Testing & Automation Testing
  • Junior ( 1-3 years ) and Senior ( 4-6 years ) Roles
Job Description
  • Analyzing existing / new feature requirements and
  • Preparing test cases and test data
  • Execute test plans and prepare test reports
  • Providing, executing & managing manual tests, automation tests and test plans
  • Perform different types of testing on the target system
  • Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
  • Creating a defect report and performing defect tracking
  • Working with a software engineer to develop unit tests, L&P tests
Requirements
  • Degree in Computer Science / Software Engineering or related discipline
  • At least 1-3 years of Relevant Experience
  • 5+ years of relevant experience for Senior Role
  • Experience in API testing tools (e.g. SoapUI, JMeter, Fiddler, Postman) is a must
  • Experience in automatic test framework such as Selenium, Appium or testCafe is a plus
  • Trouble shooting and problem-solving skills
  • Understanding and use of testing techniques
  • Knowledge in JIRA / Selenium is an advantage
  • Good communication skills in English and Chinese

companyOverview.html:
About Us

BBPOS LIMITED is a leading innovator, designer, manufacturer and provider of end-to-end mobile POS solutions to all customers in an increasingly innovation and technology driven world.

We are the first provider to introduce Audio Jack-based mPOS devices a decade ago and we are continuely passionate about extending the platform and benefits in the use of mPOS with all the flexible connectivities to deliver any transaction in anywhere and anytime securely.

We believe our people who can solve challenging problems, make a real impact and build something big in this rapid changing world. BBPOS will be the place for you to start and grow with.

BBPOS, taking Business Beyond Point Of Sale.

summary: Max 18 days AL, Flexible hr, Performance bonus

jobDescription.html:
Responsibilities:

  • Design and write test plans and test cases based on our firmware and SDK product
  • Design of automated software testing tools to facilitate the QA process
  • Write unit-test codes in test-driven design projects
  • Carry out test plans and run automated testing tools
  • Reproduce and simulate defects, errors and bugs reported
  • Assist in analyzing the potential causes of defects, errors and bugs based on observed test results
  • Verify effectiveness of fixes and corrective actions
  • Produce test results, test reports and feedback

 Qualification & Requirements

  • Bachelor degree holder in computer engineering, computer science, information system or equivalent.
  • Knowledge in testing methodology, data modeling and software verification
  • Knowledge in a wide range of software languages and programming environments, e.g., Java, Objective-C, C#, Javascript, jQuery, HTML
  • Critical thinking, logical design and analytic skills
  • Team-player with good communication skills
  • Good command of spoken & written English and Mandarin

We offer career prospect, attractive remuneration, and benefits to the right candidate. To discuss this opportunity further, please send your full resume, present and expected salary to the HR Department email or direct email to recruit @bbpos.com
All information provided will be treated in strict confidence and used for recruitment purposes only.
